org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman

Class KalmanPatRecDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman.KalmanPatRecDriver

  • public class KalmanPatRecDriver
extends Driver
    Driver for pattern recognition and fitting of HPS tracks using the Kalman Filter
